verses.verse: There was a man <S%H376><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Uz, <S%H5780><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Job; <S%H347><s%> and that man <S%H376><s%> was perfect <S%H8535><s%> and upright, <S%H3477><s%> and one that feared <S%H3373><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and eschewed <S%H5493><s%> evil. <S%H7451><s%>
And there were born <S%H3205><s%> to him seven <S%H7651><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

His substance <S%H4735><s%> also was seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> camels, <S%H1581><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> yoke <S%H6776><s%> of oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> she asses, <S%H860><s%> and a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> household; <S%H5657><s%> so that this <S%H1931><s%> man <S%H376><s%> was the greatest <S%H1419><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H1121><s%> of the east. <S%H6924><s%>

And his sons <S%H1121><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and feasted <S%H6213><s%> <S%H4960><s%> in their houses, <S%H1004><s%> every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> his day; <S%H3117><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> for their three <S%H7969><s%> sisters <S%H269><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> and to drink <S%H8354><s%> with them.

And it was so, when <S%H3588><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of their feasting <S%H4960><s%> were gone <S%H5362><s%> about, <S%H5362><s%> that Job <S%H347><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> them, and rose <S%H7925><s%> up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of them all: <S%H3605><s%> for Job <S%H347><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> It may <S%H194><s%> be that my sons <S%H1121><s%> have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> and cursed <S%H1288><s%> God <S%H430><s%> in their hearts. <S%H3824><s%> Thus <S%H3602><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> Job <S%H347><s%> continually. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>

Now there was a day <S%H3117><s%> when the sons <S%H1121><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to present <S%H3320><s%> themselves before <S%H5921><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and Satan <S%H7854><s%> came <S%H935><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Satan, <S%H7854><s%> From where <S%H370><s%> come <S%H935><s%> you? Then Satan <S%H7854><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> From going <S%H7751><s%> to and fro <S%H7751><s%> in the earth, <S%H776><s%> and from walking <S%H1980><s%> up and down in it.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Satan, <S%H7854><s%> Have you considered <S%H7760><s%> <S%H3820><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> Job, <S%H347><s%> that there is none <S%H369><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> him in the earth, <S%H776><s%> a perfect <S%H8535><s%> and an upright <S%H3477><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> one that fears <S%H3373><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and eschews <S%H5493><s%> evil? <S%H7451><s%>
Then Satan <S%H7854><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Does Job <S%H347><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> God <S%H430><s%> for nothing? <S%H2600><s%>

Have not you made an hedge <S%H7753><s%> about <S%H1157><s%> him, and about <S%H1157><s%> his house, <S%H1004><s%> and about <S%H1157><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that he has on every <S%H5437><s%> side? <S%H5439><s%> you have blessed <S%H1288><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of his hands, <S%H3027><s%> and his substance <S%H4735><s%> is increased <S%H6555><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

But put <S%H7971><s%> forth <S%H7971><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> and touch <S%H5060><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that he has, and he will curse <S%H1288><s%> you to your face. <S%H6440><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Satan, <S%H7854><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that he has is in your power; <S%H3027><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> on himself put <S%H7971><s%> not forth <S%H7971><s%> your hand. <S%H3027><s%> So Satan <S%H7854><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And there was a day <S%H3117><s%> when his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his daughters <S%H1323><s%> were eating <S%H398><s%> and drinking <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> in their oldest <S%H1060><s%> brother's <S%H251><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

And there came <S%H935><s%> a messenger <S%H4397><s%> to Job, <S%H347><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> The oxen <S%H1241><s%> were plowing, <S%H2790><s%> and the asses <S%H860><s%> feeding <S%H7462><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> them:

And the Sabeans <S%H7614><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on them, and took <S%H3947><s%> them away; yes, they have slain <S%H5221><s%> the servants <S%H5288><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and I only <S%H7535><s%> am escaped <S%H4422><s%> alone <S%H905><s%> to tell <S%H5046><s%> you.

While he was yet speaking, <S%H1696><s%> there came <S%H935><s%> also another, <S%H2088><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> The fire <S%H784><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> is fallen <S%H5307><s%> from heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and has burned <S%H1197><s%> up the sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and the servants, <S%H5288><s%> and consumed <S%H398><s%> them; and I only <S%H7535><s%> am escaped <S%H4422><s%> alone <S%H905><s%> to tell <S%H5046><s%> you.

While he was yet speaking, <S%H1696><s%> there came <S%H935><s%> also another, <S%H2088><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> The Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> made <S%H7760><s%> out three <S%H7969><s%> bands, <S%H7218><s%> and fell <S%H6584><s%> on the camels, <S%H1581><s%> and have carried <S%H3947><s%> them away, yes, and slain <S%H5221><s%> the servants <S%H5288><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and I only <S%H7535><s%> am escaped <S%H4422><s%> alone <S%H905><s%> to tell <S%H5046><s%> you.

While he was yet speaking, <S%H1696><s%> there came <S%H935><s%> also another, <S%H2088><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> were eating <S%H398><s%> and drinking <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> in their oldest <S%H1060><s%> brother's <S%H251><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there came <S%H935><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> from the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and smote <S%H5060><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6438><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> and it fell <S%H5307><s%> on the young <S%H5288><s%> men, and they are dead; <S%H4191><s%> and I only <S%H7535><s%> am escaped <S%H4422><s%> alone <S%H905><s%> to tell <S%H5046><s%> you.

Then Job <S%H347><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and rent <S%H7167><s%> his mantle, <S%H4598><s%> and shaved <S%H1494><s%> his head, <S%H7218><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%> down on the ground, <S%H776><s%> and worshipped, <S%H7812><s%>

And said, <S%H559><s%> Naked <S%H6174><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> I out of my mother's <S%H517><s%> womb, <S%H990><s%> and naked <S%H6174><s%> shall I return <S%H7725><s%> thither: <S%H8033><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave, <S%H5414><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has taken <S%H3947><s%> away; blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
In all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> Job <S%H347><s%> sinned <S%H2398><s%> not, nor <S%H3808><s%> charged <S%H5414><s%> God <S%H430><s%> foolishly. <S%H8604><s%>
